text: 18:14 Jop 22:29; Matyu 23:12; Luk 14:11; Jems 4:6; 1 Pita 5:5-6Kamaghɨn amizɨ kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, gumazir dagɨaba isir kam, a Godɨn damazimɨn dera, egha dɨpenimɨn ghu. Ezɨ igharazim puvatɨ. Gumazamizir uan ziaba feba, God me abɨnam. Eghtɨ gumazamizir uari abɨriba, God me feghtɨ me ziar ekiaba iniam.”
